title: Could a rioter help with champion pronunciation?
body:
Using the [international phonetic alphabet](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/International_Phonetic_Alphabet), could someone write the name of all champions?

I NEED TO KNOW HOW TO SAY EZREAL !!!

replies.body: [In His Pulsefire skin it literally says his own name in the AI VO :P](http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/dc/PulsefireEzreal.move9.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20121126224016)
Yeah nobody know how to use that but his name is just pronounced as "Israel" but with an "eh" sound at the start.
this is {{champion:81}}  as it gets *sips apple juice*
someone give this baby his bottle
Simply watch the champion spotlight videos,they say the name of each champ at the beginning.
Good idea. They don't have it for every champ, though.
Watch lcs casters.  They tend to get all the names correct.
Yeah, when the champions are picked...
Just google "lcs <champ name> game"  on YouTube.  You also should have no issue finding an ezreal game.
